FIG. 7 , each mode 80, 82, 84, and 86 has a respective associated graphics library 64 which contains the functions used to draw the image 50 directly to the display screen 30 in the corresponding orientation. Each set of functions is pregenerated through the systems composite code for the associated viewing mode 80, 82, 84, 86. For a given mode 80, 82, 84, 86, its given graphics library 64 contains the code needed to draw a subject image 50 directly to the display screen 30 according to the orientation/rotation defined by that mode.
